quest.name: The Lady in Red
objectives: Speak with Orella at Rhalgr's Reach.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alisaie will make a full recovery, but I doubt she will be well enough to take to the field again before this is over.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: I can imagine how you must feel, but I want you to know that many of us here are grateful for what you did at Abania.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: I'll never get used to it, killing my own countrymen. In the heat of battle, it's either you or them, but after...when you've had time to think about what you've done...

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: I am told one of your comrades was injured during the operation. If there is aught we can do to help, pray do not hesitate to ask.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I've been thinking. If Alisaie needs more time to heal, maybe we should move her to Rhalgr's Reach.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: She can receive much better care there, after all. Our infirmary is probably the best place for her, short of sending her to Gridania.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Indeed. And given what Mistress Woad has told us, I would rather she did not remain here.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Then it's settled. Naago, go and see about getting us a carriage and an escort. Alphinaud, you should get your sister ready for the journey.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Forename, would you mind going on ahead and telling Orella that we're on our way? I want a bed waiting for Alisaie when she arrives. Thanks.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: They'll learn what it means to live free. We'll teach them. Together.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Must seem strange seeing me doling out orders. But not half as strange as it feels to do it, let me tell you.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Hm? Do you require assistance?

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Very well, we will make ready to receive the patient at once. Give me a hand, would you?

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: There. All crisp and freshly laundered.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We're here. Is everything in order?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Right. We're bringing her in.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Honestly, Alphinaud, you needn't have gone to all this trouble...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: What can I say? It seemed a good way to discourage you from limping off to battle when my back was turned. Listen to Orella, please. You need your rest.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text:
I know, I know...
Any news of Krile? She'll be cross if you make her wait too long. As will I.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Hah. A chilling prospect indeed... I'll find her, Sister. And I'll fight twice as hard─for the both of us.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: They're good together...when they're not at each other's throats. I miss that feeling...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Forename─I have a favor to ask. Would you mind waiting outside for me? I won't be a moment.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We'll find Krile and bring her home. After all, I need her to tell you to stay in bed.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I should have been there with you to the end. If only I hadn't been so reckless...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> Maybe we got a little carried away... But you have to admit that was fun.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. You're the best kind of friend─the kind that's not afraid to knock some sense into you.
